page.title: 15CHRISTMAS IN INKBERROW.
page.content: At Christmas we have a big fir tree on the village green with lots of lights.The pubs and shops are decorated with tinsel and Christmas trees.There are many special services at the church around Christmas.At the "Carols by Candlelight" service we sing carols holding candles.On Christmas Eve we sing carols round the Christmas tree on the village green.Christmas concerts are held at school for mums and dads,and the children break up from school and have a holiday.A pantomime is put on by the Drama group and P.T.A.The school cook makes a special dinner and there are decorations on the tables.We have a Christmas party and Father Christmas comes to every class with a sack of presents.We have a post box in school and send cards to our friends.
